thread.title: China Iron-Ore Futures Open to Outside World

author: Biman Mukherji
title: China Iron-Ore Futures Open to Outside World
text: Barely a month after launching yuan-denominated oil futures, China on Thursday will start allowing foreign investors to trade in its historically volatile iron-ore market. As in crude, the country is the worldâ€™s biggest consumer of iron ore, a key ingredient for steelmaking.
